codesetupwarn: Uncheck it to skip pasting code.(login to Mastodon on Windows or macOS) (Recommended: pcheck)
codepastewarn: Paste the code and close the browser.
accessTokenSetup: Use the access token to login (Fill the access-token into the Advanced box)
haveExported: Having the exported file of TheDesk, click here to jump to the settings page
